casebody.data:
The DOYLE GROUP
v.
ALASKANS FOR CUDDY. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

James P. Sexton and Michael S. Taylor, Hartford, in support of the petition.

Robert P. Hanahan, Waterbury, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants Alaskans for Cuddy and David Cuddy for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 164 Conn.App. 209, 137 A.3d 809 (2016), is denied.
